article.articlebody: As others in this series and elsewhere have noted, former President Donald Trump is in trouble. He is probably weaker politically than he has been at any time since he won the 2016 Republican...

metatags.og:title: Political Advertising on Social Media Platforms
metatags.og:description: Political advertising on social media has been a game changer for campaigns, candidates, and the public discourse. As the 2020 election draws closer, we need to take a look at the policies that social media platforms are implementing with regard to political ads, and what the implications are for our democratic process.
